alert.note: Alert for Polk (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued February 04 at 9:10PM CST until February 05 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 20 degrees expected. * WHERE...Polk County. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 10 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
